Serverless [SolidSnakeRu]
0401F8C0 60000000
045A0FEC 38000001
Allows to join a lobby alone without needing server responses
Beware, taking damage (explosives) will crash the game

045EB530 00000011
045EB518 496337DE
Replaces the M1 Bazooka by the Panzerschreck on German side

8121000C 81410010
81610014 38210020
807C0014 00000000
Play Campaign Maps in Multiplayer Mode! Version 1 textures
Game Names: Each MP Campaign game MUST be named starting with "MPC" or "mpc"
Password: Each game should be password protected (e.g. "irsvds")
Limitations: CTF not swapped. Textures are not 100% correct, but very playable!
